    1. subpass(RenderPass.subpass.Reference[], RenderPass.subpass.Reference)

Klasse RenderPass.subpass

java.lang.Object
Kartoffel.Licht.Vulkan.RenderPass.subpass
Umschließende Klasse:
RenderPass
public static class RenderPass.subpass extends Object
A subpass represents a phase of rendering that reads and writes a subset of the attachments in a render pass. Rendering commands are recorded into a particular subpass of a render pass instance.
Siehe auch:
